== Introduction ==

These release notes for Kubuntu 19.04 (Disco Dingo) provide an overview of the release and document the known issues.

== Support lifespan ==

Kubuntu 19.04 will be supported for 9 months until January 2020.

== Getting Kubuntu 19.04 ==

=== Upgrading from 18.10 ===

Detailed upgrade instructions can be found here: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/DiscoUpgrades/Kubuntu|Kubuntu 18.10 to 19.04 Upgrade ]]</nowiki>

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/19.04/release/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

The following link contains some tips to put the image onto a <nowiki>[[ http:--docs.kubuntu.org-docs-installation.html | DVD or USB Drive ]]</nowiki>

== New features and changes in 19.04 ==

=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.15: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:KubuntuDisco.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/plasma-5.15.0.php|Plasma 5.15]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup. Kubuntu ships the 4th scheduled bugfix release of 5.15 (5.15.4). <<BR>> <<BR>> Kubuntu 19.04 is built on and ships with Qt 5.12.2

==== KDE Applications 18.12.3 ====

<nowiki>[[File:KDEApps18-12.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

Kubuntu comes with <nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/announce-applications-18.12.0.php|KDE Applications 18.12.3]]</nowiki> containing all your favourite apps from KDE. Provided is the 18.12.3 update with bugfixes and translation updates. All applications included in KDE Apps 18.12 have been ported to <nowiki>[[https://dot.kde.org/2013/09/25/frameworks-5|KDE Frameworks 5]]</nowiki>.

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/66.0/releasenotes/|Firefox 66 ]]</nowiki> is the default browser 
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/6.2|LibreOffice 6.2.2]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

=== Other new and updated applications ===

* latte-dock - The latest stable bugfix <nowiki>[[http://psifidotos.blogspot.com/2019/04/latte-bug-fix-release-v088.html|release 0.8.8]]</nowiki> is now in the ubuntu archive
* KDevelop - Now the latest <nowiki>[[https://www.kdevelop.org/news/kdevelop-532-released|5.3.2 release]]</nowiki> in the archive.
* Krita - Updated to latest <nowiki>[[https://krita.org/en/item/krita-4-1-7-released/|stable 4.1.7]]</nowiki> in the archive.
* kde-config-tablet - is now back on the ISO and default install, which implements a KDE configuration GUI for the Wacom drivers.

== Other highlights/notes ==

==== Plasma Wayland session - Can be installed for testing, but is not supported for 19.04 ====

* A Plasma Wayland session can be be made available for testing by installing the package '''plasma-workspace-wayland''' , however '''this is not supported'''. Users needing a stable desktop experience should select the normal 'Plasma' (without Wayland) option at login.

* (Bug:1681144) Clicking on URLs in Kubuntu Installer Slideshow does nothing
* (Bug:1681830) Ubiquity installer - No Label shown for where to enter LVM Encryption Passwords fields
* (Bug:1681830) No wireless networks displayed for broadcom BCM43142
